# Header Gossip Network Test Vectors

This document contains test vectors for the Header Gossip Network to help implementations conform to the specification.

## Header Accumulator Encodings

These test vectors specify the proper encoding of the header accumulator in certain well defined scenarios

### Epoch 0 Accumulator

#### Accumulator after genesis block

This test vector represents the input parameters and the expected output for the header accumulator after adding
the genesis block from Ethereum Mainnet.

##### Input Parameters
```
genesis block rlp = 
```
##### Expected Output
```
accumulator hash root = 0x805f89da6f82d12c3631a0ce79fe5909403cd6e6080b58e59c7b0ee79bf5e06f
```

#### Current Epoch Accumulator after Block 1
This test vector represents the input parameters and the expected output for the header accumulator after adding
block 1 from Ethereum Mainnet.

##### Input Parameters
```
block 1 rlp = 
```
##### Expected Output
```
accumulator hash root = 0xcbac350e772c206ff9922ac11264c1b6bdfdd0dabfb8487ae8a9b12d3b608d93
```

#### Current Epoch Accumulator after Block 2
This test vector represents the input parameters and the expected output for the header accumulator after adding
block 2 from Ethereum Mainnet.

#### Input Parameters
```
block 2 rlp = 
```
#### Expected Output
```
accumulator hash root = 0x4c43d29354c2f044d8cc20ec9a8703a18187ff52a03bb66b1ae14e1f7109b042
```
